I used a can of pillsbury buttermilk biscuits.', '1 cup Granulated sugar', '1 Oil to fry in', '1 When I go to the chinese place by my house and order chinese donuts they open a can of biscuits, fry them whole and toss in sugar for $ 5. I can make 4 times that for about $ 3',<sep> directions: 'Heat your oil in a pot just over medium.', 'Cut up each biscuit, cut into thirds then each third in half.', 'Drop carefully into oil.', 'After 30 second or so mix to flip with a metal slotted spoon.', 'When they're as dark as you'd like, remove with the slotted spoon letting excess oil drain off the spoon before putting into sugar.', 'Toss in the sugar and place on a plate with a paper towel on it.'

ingredients:  'Heaping 1/3 cup fresh mint leaves', '2 cups water', 'honey',<sep> directions: 'Put the mint leaves in a ceramic pot, and pour the boiling water over them.Let them steep, covered, for at least 7 minutes. Strain the leaves out of the water when the desired strength is reached. Add honey to taste.'

ingredients:  '1 c. Flour', '1 c. Sugar', '1 c. Milk', '3 tsp. Baking Powder', '1/2 stick Butter', 'Berries or Fruit',<sep> directions: 'Stir with a spoon the first 4 ingredients.', 'Mix well.', 'Melt butter in baking dish then add batter.', 'Then add berries or fruit. ingredients:  '3/4 c. mushrooms, cleaned and diced', '2 Tbsp. butter or margarine', '1 lb. fillet of haddock, cooked and flaked or comparable fish', '1/4 c. butter or margarine', '1/8 tsp. onion salt', '5 egg whites', '4 Tbsp. flour', '1 c. milk', '3 egg yolks, slightly beaten', '1 tsp. salt', 'dash of nutmeg', 'dash of cayenne pepper', '1/8 tsp. celery salt', '1/4 tsp. paprika',<sep> directions: 'Preheat oven to moderate (350°).', 'Grease 2-quart casserole.'

ingredients:  '1 lb. twist macaroni, cooked', '1 head broccoli (tips only)', '2 zucchini, cut up bite size', '3 yellow squash, cut up bite size', '1 small jar green olives with pimento', '1 small can black pitted olives', '1 (16 oz.) bottle Caesar dressing',<sep> directions: 'Combine all ingredients and chill overnight.', 'Toss and serve.'
ingredients:  '1 c. flour', '1 c. corn meal', '3 tsp. baking powder', '1 egg', '1 1/2 c. milk',<sep> directions: 'Bake about 30 to 40 minutes at 375°.'

ingredients:  '2 c. cooked carrots, mashed', '1/2 tsp. grated onion', '3 beaten eggs', '1 c. milk', '2 Tbsp. melted butter', '1 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. pepper',<sep> directions: 'Mix ingredients in order given.', 'Pour into well greased ring mold.', 'Set mold in a shallow pan of water and bake at 350° for 40 minutes or until firm.', 'Remove from oven.', 'Let stand for a few minutes, loosen edges and turn out carefully.', 'Fill center with green peas.'

ingredients:  '1 lb. hamburger', '1/2 c. onion', '1/4 c. celery', '1/4 c. green pepper', '1 can mushroom soup', '1 can chicken soup', '1 can water', '3/4 c. milk', '1 box long grain rice', '1 jar pimentos',<sep> directions: 'Fry hamburger, onions, celery and green pepper together.', 'Mix the soups, water, milk, rice and the pimentos together.', 'Mix all together and put in a baking dish.', 'Bake at 325° for 45 minutes to 1 hour.'
